Step 5: Extrude the 2D sketch Extrude the 2D sketch by 0.75 units to create the 3D model. Step 5: Perform a cut feature Cut the 3D model (previously created in Part 1) with this new feature, removing the cylindrical section by 0.5 units along the normal direction. This will add a tapered end to the original cylindrical object.</description>
